name: Klein Tools NCVT-5A Voltage Tester, Non-Contact Dual Range Voltage Tester Pen with Integrated Laser Pointer and Visual and Audible Alerts
short_description: VERSATILE DETECTION: Non-Contact Voltage Tester automatically detects AC voltage in cables, cords, circuit breakers, lighting fixtures, switches, non-tamper-resistant outlets and wires
CLEAR INDICATION: Bright LED illuminates green to indicate tester is operational and flashes red or blue and emits a beeping alert when voltage is detected
DUAL OPERATING RANGE: With a power operating range of 12 to 1000V AC for low voltage and 70 to 1000V AC for standard voltage applications
INTEGRATED LASER POINTER: The tester features a bright laser pointer for easy identification of objects of interest at a distance on the jobsite
BATTERY SAVING FEATURE: Auto-power off after inactivity helps conserve battery life, extending the device's usability
ENHANCED DURABILITY: 9.8 ft. (3 m) drop protection and CAT IV 1000V safety rated to meet jobsite demands
COMPLETE PACKAGE: Includes the Non-Contact Voltage Tester, instructions, and 2 x AAA batteries
product_description: The Klein Tools NCVT-5A is a dual-range non-contact voltage tester (NCVT) with integrated laser pointer. The tester can be set to detect voltage from 70 to 1000V AC (Mode 1) or from 12 to 1000V AC (Mode 2). High pitched audible alerts beep at greater frequency as higher voltage is sensed, or proximity to the voltage source gets closer. The laser pointer can function independent of or simultaneously with the NCVT. CAT IV 1000V safety rating. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

name: Southwire 40150N Advanced AC Non Contact Voltage Tester Pen; Dual Range 12-1000VAC/100-1000VAC; Non Contact Voltage Detector with LED Flashlight; 6' drop test rated; and IP67 waterproof; NCVT
short_description: PEN STYLE non contact electrical tester for easy detection of AC voltage
AUDIBLE AND VISUAL INDICATION of AC voltage on two ranges:12 to 1000V and 100 to 1000V
BI-COLOR LED verifies tester is on and range selected; red LED & beeper indicate voltage is detected
RUGGED IP67 WATERPROOF and dust tight housing with a 6' drop test rating

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL this electric tester features a built-in forward and rear facing flashlight for user convenienceThe tester will not detect voltage if the voltage is DC; Wire is shielded or in a grounded metal box or conduit; the user is not grounded or is isolated from earth ground; the detector tip cannot be fully inserted into the electrical outlet; the electrical outlet is a Tamper Resistant design; the user is not holding the detector or the user‚Äôs hand is insulated from the detector (ie with a glove); the voltage source or wire is partially buried
product_description: The Southwire Tools & Equipment 40150N is an advanced dual range non-contact AC voltage detector with a convenient work light. It features audible and visual indication of AC voltage on two ranges: 12 to 1000V and 100 to 1000V. Bi-color LED verifies tester is on and range selected, red LED and beeper indicates voltage is detected. The yellow LED light indicates that the tic tester is in low voltage mode. The non contact voltage tester features a rugged IP67 WATERPROOF and dust tight housing and features a built-in forward and rear facing flashlight for user convenience in dim lighting. With electricity safety is paramount so it features CAT IV rating at 1000V and is UL Listed. This unit is not designed for use with Tamper Resistant (TR) outlets. This unit is built to help electricians have a great indicator of live power. It features a pocket clip for easy access and storage and the low power feature will indicate when the batteries need to be changed. Testing a wire is very easy with this unit.

name: Voltage Tester, HABOTEST Voltage Tester with LCD Display, Live/Null Wire Tester, Electrical Tester Buzzer Alarm and Flashlight, Wire Breakpoint Finder for Home,Car,Light
short_description: 【CONTACT VOLTAGE TESTER】This contact voltage tester pen to detect AC voltage by simply inserting the metal tip into an outlet or touch it to a wire,providing peace of mind quickly and accurately.What sets this voltage tester apart is its simplicity and reliability.The intuitive design allows for easy operation with just the press of a button,and the bright LCD indicator and beeps provides clear visual confirmation of voltage presence. ﻿

【DUAL ALERT SYSTEM】The visual indication of voltage presence ensures quick and easy identification,even in low-light conditions.The live/null wire tester's audible alert serves as an additional layer of confirmation,the loud and distinct buzzer is particularly useful in noisy environments.The LCD lights of the non contact voltage tester from green to red and beeps then the outlet has live electrical current running through it.If the screen remains green then there is no power and it is safe to work on.

【AUTO POWER OFF & LOW BATTERY INDICATE】The voltage tester cames with 1 battery,and worked right out of the box.After approximately 3 mins of inactivity and no signal detection,the electrical tester will automatically turn off to extend battery life.When the battery voltage is below 2.5 volts,the display will show a low battery symbol.Bright LED flashlight for work in dim ares,Pocket-sized, pen hook allows you to carry it in your shirt pocket.

【SECURITY LEVEL】 IEC rated CAT III 1000V CAT IV 600V, Meets CE requirements; The electrical tester is safely double insulated. High Voltage Alert to warn you of voltage above 90V, the screen turn red and the safety symbol on the screen shines.

【SAFETY & GOOD SERVICE】Meets CE requirements, rated CAT III 1000V CAT IV 600V.The non contact voltage tester pen is suitable for a wide range of applications,from residential electrical work to industrial settings,which versatility and accuracy make it an indispensable tool for troubleshooting,maintenance, and installation tasks,ensuring it meets the diverse needs of electricians working on different projects. We provide 36-Month after sale service, Please feel free to contact us if you have any concerns.

name: Neoteck Non-Contact AC Voltage Tester Pen, AC 12-1000V, LED Flashlight, Buzzer Alarm for Live/Null Wire Judgment
short_description: 【Non-contact Voltage Tester】 Ranging 12-1000V AC, You can easily distinguish the live and null wire through different level of alarm sound and LED indicator. ( Note Please:Not Suitable for Christmas Light Testing)
【Safe and Convenient】 The Voltage Pen Tester Detectes Voltage in a Non-Contact Way, So Do Not Worry about There Could be any Possibility of being Shocked by the Electricity
【High Efficiency】 As Long As Voltage is Detected, the Led in the Tester Pen will Shine

【Multifunction, Easy to Use】 It Also Acts as an Emergency Flashlight which can Illuminate the Working Area, You can Use the Non Contact Voltage Detector in Circuit Breakers, Lighting Fixtures, Switches, Outlets, Wires and Anywhere You Need it
【CE CAT III600V RoHS Certificate】 A Professional Tester, It is Perfectly Suitable also for DIY'ers, Hobbyists and Home Owners, It Helps You Make the First and the Most Important Safety Check

name: TESMEN Voltage Tester, TN-213 Non-Contact Voltage Detector, Electrical Tester, AC 12V-/70V-1000V, Dual-Range, LCD Display in Percentage, Buzzer Alarm, Live Wire Test, Wire Breakpoint Finder - Green
short_description: Visual and Audible Alert: When voltage is detected, the tip emits a red light, the screen turns red, and an alarm sound is triggered. As the detected voltage increases, the red light and alarm sound frequency accelerates. Meanwhile, the LCD screen's percentage value and bar graphs also increase. It could be applied to test AC voltage in cables, wires, circuit breakers, lighting fixtures, switches, and non-tamper-resistant sockets

NCV and IP66: CAT Ⅲ 1000V, CAT Ⅳ 600V, and RoHS certified. The TN-213 voltage tester pen is equipped with an NCV probe to distinguish between live and neutral wire safely. The electrical tester is rated as IP66, providing both waterproof and dustproof capabilities

High and Low Sensitivity: TN-213 suits different voltage detection ranges. Its detection range is 12-1000V at high sensitivity and 70-1000V at low sensitivity. Low range can be applied to motorized curtains, irrigation wiring, outdoor low-voltage lighting, etc. You can adjust the sensitivity mode by pressing the S button. As turned on, the tester will be on high-sensitivity mode by default

User-Friendly Design: This pocket-sized voltage tester comes with a convenient pen hook, allowing you to carry it in your shirt pocket with ease. Plus, it features a bright flashlight, enabling you to perform circuit tests even in low-light conditions. To extend battery life, it automatically shuts down after 5 minutes of inactivity

What you will get: A portable non-contact voltage tester, two AAA batteries, and a user manual. The TN-213 is ideal for electricians, DIY enthusiasts, and homeowners who need a reliable, easy-to-use tool for safely detecting live wire

name: Proster Non Contact Voltage Tester Pen - Adjustable Sensitivity AC Voltage Detector, Electric Volt Pen Tester Pen 12-1000V/48-1000V, Contactless Voltage Detector
short_description: Non Contact Voltage Detector: The default AC voltage tester measurement range is 48-1000V, it can also measure 12-1000V by adjusting the sensitivity. Practical and convenient way to test electrical lines
High & Low Sensitivity Electric Pen Tester: Ideal voltage tester allows automatic selection of 3 kinds of sensitivity (High,Medium,low). Live/Neutral wire distinguish at close range

Visible & Audible Alarm for Contactless Voltage Tester: Audible and visual alarm always guard your safety. Using the ABS and PVC material, the Voltage Tester can stand wear and tear, and its pocket clip allows easy handling

Easy Electric Pen Tester: Auto power-off feature conserves energy. While the LED torch allows operation even on dark corners. The shining prompt of low voltage LED can warn you to replace the battery in time

Multi-Function Voltage Tester: Using the ABS and PVC material, the Voltage Tester can stand wear and tear, and its pocket clip allows easy handling; We provide a 18-Month after-sale service, Please feel free to contact us if you have any concern

name: Voltage Tester Pen with Non-Contact Detection,High-Sensitivity Electrical Tester for Wires, Outlets, and Switches–Buzzer and LED Alerts for Safe, Accurate AC Voltage Testing
short_description: Unmatched Safety and Reliability: The CAT IV 1000V rating signifies the highest level of protection for use at the source of low-voltage installations. Continuous self-testing ensures the device is always functioning correctly before each use. The non-contact principle keeps you safely away from dangerous voltages.

Crystal-Clear, Dual Alert System: Stay informed instantly. A bright LED light flashes during normal operation and shines steadily when voltage is detected. The piercing loud buzzer sounds simultaneously for undeniable alerts in noisy environments. Need quiet? Easily mute the buzzer with a 3-second button press – the LED light remains fully functional.

Precise positioning and reduced false alarms: Advanced technology can accurately detect conductor voltage while minimizing interference signals from ambient electric fields in the air, giving you confidence in the detection results.

Designed for Real Work: Lightweight, pocket-sized (perfect for your shirt pocket!), and incredibly durable, this voltage tester is built for daily use on the job site or around the house. Easily maneuver it into confined spaces like electrical panels or outlet boxes.

Wide-Ranging Applications: It's more than just a voltage detector! Use it as an outlet tester, receptacle tester, plug tester, circuit breaker finder, live wire identifier, or for basic continuity checks on wires and cables. A true multi-purpose electrical sniffer and power tester.
product_description: The Non-Contact Voltage Tester Pen is an essential tool for anyone working with electricity. Whether you're a professional electrician, a DIY enthusiast, or someone who simply wants to ensure their home electrical system is safe, this tester provides peace of mind with accurate and reliable results.

name: Pen Type Digital Multimeter AC Voltage Tester 6000 Counts Intelligent 2in1 Non Contact Voltmeter 12V-1000V Pen Test Live Wire Resistance Continuity Diode NCV Mode Cannot Measure DC
short_description: Smart and Comprehensive Measurements: The ALLmeter Pen Type Digital Multimeter features intelligent automatic range detection for AC/DC voltage, resistance, diode, and continuity measurements. It also includes non-contact voltage (NCV) detection and live wire identification.In NCV mode, it can only detect alternating current (AC) and cannot measure direct current (DC)

True RMS and High Accuracy: The multimeter's true RMS feature ensures accurate measurements, providing reliable results for various electrical parameters. With a maximum count of 6000, it delivers precise readings for enhanced accuracy

Non-Contact Voltage Detection:Safely detect live wires without direct contact using the non-contact voltage detection feature of the ALLmeter, with a wide range of 12V-1000V.NCV mode,can only detect alternating current (AC) ,not direct current (DC).The intelligent auto-detection function eliminates the need to manually switch measurement ranges, simplifying the measurement process for AC voltage, resistance, and continuity

Clear Readings and High Visibility: The LCD display of the ALLmeter provides clear and accurate readings, even in low-light conditions, ensuring high visibility and convenience.The ALLmeter includes a low-battery indicator for timely battery replacement, ensuring uninterrupted usage. The built-in illuminating light enhances visibility in dimly lit environments. Its compact size and soft cloth pouch make it easy to carry and store

Convenient and User-Friendly Design: With its compact and portable pen-type design, the ALLmeter offers easy operation and is suitable for professionals and DIY enthusiasts. The integrated voltage tester functionality allows for quick and efficient testing

name: 3000 Ultimate AC Sensor - Compact Non-Contact Voltage Detector, 50-1000VAC, CAT IV Certified, Made in USA, Electrician Tools, Volt Meter, Outlet & Circuit Tester, Pen Sized Design
short_description: Detects Wide Voltage Range: Safely identifies live wires with a voltage range from 50-1000V AC, ensuring broad application from home to industrial environments. Santronics is the top choice for electrical tools for electricians.

Non-Contact Operation: Our non-contact voltage tester pen offers quick and accurate voltage readings without direct contact with wires, enhancing safety and convenience for electricians and maintenance professionals.
Audible and Visual Alerts: Features a high-intensity SMD LED and audio alerts that indicate the presence of voltage, ensuring clear and immediate feedback in noisy or dark settings.
Durable and Safe Design: Constructed from non-flammable, high-impact polycarbonate with a non-conductive body, probe, and cap, designed for rigorous use and additional user safety.
Portable and Ready-to-Use: Our pen-sized voltage tester detector with no on/off switch required, always ready for immediate use, perfect for busy professionals on the go.
